sentences.cn: “ 可并不是我埋葬的, 德伐日公民. ”

sentences.en: " Apparently the Citizen - Doctor is not in his right mind?
sentences.cn: “ 医生公民的头脑显然是出了问题,是 么 ?

sentences.en: " You did good service at the taking of the Bastille, citizen? "
sentences.cn: “ 你在攻占巴士底狱时表现良好,是么, 公民? ”

sentences.en: Athens had turned against its most brilliant and virtuous citizen.
sentences.cn: 雅典把矛头指向其最有才有德的人.

sentences.en: Before becoming a full-blown director, he worked as the film editor on Citizen Kane.
sentences.cn: 在成为一名完全成熟的导演之前，他曾经是电影《公民凯恩》的剪辑师。

sentences.en: But he is denounced - and gravely - by the Citizen and Citizeness Defarge.
sentences.cn: 不过告发他的 —— 严重告发他的 —— 是公民德伐日夫妇.

sentences.en: Every citizen has the duty to construct his country.
sentences.cn: 每个公民都有建设祖国的责任.

sentences.en: Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.
sentences.cn: 每一公民均可要求法律的保护.

sentences.en: Good evening, citizen, " filling his glass.
sentences.cn: 晚上好, 公民, ” 他往杯里斟酒.

sentences.en: He became a British citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.
sentences.cn: 他成了英国公民, 因而得到了投票权.

sentences.en: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
sentences.cn: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

sentences.en: In China, every citizen who has reached the age of eighteen has the right to vote and stand for election.
sentences.cn: 在中国,凡年满18岁的公民, 都有选举权和被选举权.

sentences.en: Prussia made him an honorary citizen.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士市授予他“荣誉市民”的称号.

sentences.en: She's Italian by birth but is now an Australian citizen.
sentences.cn: 她生于意大利，但现在是澳大利亚公民。

sentences.en: The mayor urged citizens to begin preparing for a major storm.
sentences.cn: 一场特大暴风雨即将到来，市长敦促市民做好准备。

sentences.en: We need our schools to teach students to be good citizens.
sentences.cn: 我们需要学校把学生培养为好公民。

sentences.en: Work is the glorious duty of every able - bodied citizen.
sentences.cn: 劳动是一切有劳动能力的公民的光荣职责.

words.tran_cn: [法] 公民身份，公民资格；国籍；公民权

phrases.tran_cn: 世界公民，四海为家的人

trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a particular town, country, or state
